fields.name: Finance & Accounting
fields.description: Financial processes including invoicing, payments, and reporting

fields.name: Human Resources
fields.description: HR processes including onboarding, payroll, and employee management

fields.name: Invoice Processing
fields.description: Template for assessing invoice processing automation potential
fields.guidance_text: Invoice processing is typically highly repetitive with clear rules. Consider volume and standardization of invoice formats.

fields.name: Employee Onboarding
fields.description: Template for assessing employee onboarding automation potential
fields.guidance_text: Employee onboarding involves multiple systems and some human interaction. Focus on standardizing processes first.

fields.name: Data Entry
fields.description: Template for assessing data entry automation potential
fields.guidance_text: Data entry is ideal for automation when inputs are standardized and rules are clear.
